pullRequest.title: Added Junit Tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added Junit tests for service/api/service/config package
Added Junit tests for service/stream/api package
Added Junit tests for ExceptionMessageUtils class
Added Junit tests for DeviceMenagmentException class
Added Junit tests for KapuaDuplicateExternalIdException class
Added Junit tests for KapuaDuplicateExternalIdInAnotherAccountError
class
Added Junit tests for KapuaDuplicateNameException class
Added Junit tests for KapuaDuplicateNameInAnotherAccountError class
Added Junit tests for KapuaEndBeforeStartTimeException class
Added Junit tests for KapuaEntityNotFoundException class
Signed-off-by: Sonja sonja.matic@comtrade.com
